title: 一些变量问题&Vault连接错误
author: 0ojixueseno0
txt_content:
我是用的权限组插件为GroupManagerPlus 但Vault没能够识别连接出来，使用指令/vault-info查看后的信息为
[17:11:35 INFO]: [Vault] Vault v1.6.6-b${env.TRAVIS_BUILD_NUMBER} Information
[17:11:35 INFO]: [Vault] Economy: Essentials Economy [Essentials Economy]
[17:11:35 INFO]: [Vault] Permission: SuperPerms [SuperPerms]
[17:11:35 INFO]: [Vault] Chat: None [null]
复制代码这导致了GM+的聊天前缀/后缀不显示和papi的变量无法加载 以下变量在MiaoBoard中无法加载，希望解决 %vault_eco_balance% %vault_prefix% %dz_level% %dz_exp% %dz_exptolevel% （dz来自ILO插件[BBS版]） 服务器信息：
[17:15:05 INFO]: This server is running Paper version git-Paper-1581 (MC: 1.12.2
) (Implementing API version 1.12.2-R0.1-SNAPSHOT)
[17:15:05 INFO]: Previous version: git-Paper-1574 (MC: 1.12.2)
[17:15:05 INFO]: Checking version, please wait...
[17:15:07 INFO]: You are 36 version(s) behind
复制代码插件信息： Vault：Vault v1.6.6-b${env.TRAVIS_BUILD_NUMBER} Information EssentialsX:EssentialsX 已重新载入 2.16.1.169. GM+:[17:16:37 INFO]: [GM+] -=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-[17:16:37 INFO]: [GM+] [17:16:37 INFO]: [GM+] ★ YOU ARE USING LATEST VERSION! (3.1) [17:16:37 INFO]: [GM+] [17:16:37 INFO]: [GM+] -=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=- [17:16:37 INFO]: [GM+] [17:16:37 INFO]: [GM+] GroupManger+ [v3.1] has been enabled. [17:16:37 INFO]: [GM+] Author: HappyAreaBean [17:16:37 INFO]: [GM+] [17:16:37 INFO]: [GM+] [INFO] World Found: rpg [17:16:37 INFO]: [GM+] [INFO] World Found: world [17:16:37 INFO]: [GM+] [INFO] Superperms support enabled. [17:16:37 INFO]: [GM+] [INFO] Scheduled Data Saving is set for every 10 minutes! [17:16:37 INFO]: [GM+] [INFO] Backups will be retained for 24 hours! [17:16:37 INFO]: [GM+] [INFO] GroupManager+ v3.1 is now enabled! [17:16:37 INFO]: WEPIF: Using the Bukkit Permissions API. [17:16:37 INFO]: [GM+] All settings and worlds were reloaded! [17:16:37 INFO]: [GM+] [INFO] Bukkit Permissions Updated! ILO：v3.0

replies.author: 0ojixueseno0
replies.txt_content:
a1294790523 发表于 2019-7-7 23:01
试试1.6.7版本？https://www.spigotmc.org/resources/vault.34315/download?version=240549
还是没有连接上，EssX和GM+都配置好了不太想换
